metadata.title: CVE-2021-34121 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: An Out of Bounds flaw was discovered in htmodoc 1.9.12 in function parse_tree() in toc.cxx, this possibly leads to memory layout information leaking in the data. This might be used in a chain of vulnerability in order to reach code execution.

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
